name: FeatureSpace
description: Container for either a set of features or a regular expression that define a feature space (e.g., Entrez Gene IDs, Affymetrix probeset IDs for a specific platform, etc.)

name.name: Descriptive name for the record (e.g., 'Entrez Gene')

values.name: A character array containing two or more features over which the space is defined, or a single regular expression that matches all features in the space
